name: 2020 Towers
description:
Does 2020 have you feeling like you can't wait to get off this planet already? Well, it's time to shoot for the stars!

Fed up with how crummy this year has been going (so far), you set off to build and climb a tower that will reach the moon in order to escape it. But unspeakable horrors throughout the miserable year have turned your ambitious project into a race against the clock. It's up to you to finish your tower to the big white disc in the sky, before the year finishes you off once and for all!

Controls:

A & D Keys - Walk left and right

W Key - Place block above you

Space - Jump

Tips:

  • Press jump while leaning against a wall to initiate a wall slide. You can jump off the wall by pressing jump again.
  • Placing blocks is your only way up, but they cost money to put down. Be careful how you spend, the government's only willing to give you so many stimulus checks!
  • You can also purchase food to replenish health, and medicine to cure you if you get sick.


    Background and block art assets courtesy of https://supericon.itch.io/free-pixel-pack, with revisions by Nick Banducci and Yitong Hu

    Music by mathgrant (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/mathgrant/30s30d_A_Months_Worth_of_Composing)
